title: Why do Ad champs get 3 MR with AD options, and AP champs get 1 armor with AP option?

Hey you're right,  I'll edit it. 

But an item having health, doesn't immediately make it a survivability item. 

Sure, the item might improve how long you survive for by giving you health, but it doesn't classify that item as being purely based around that. 

It's kind of like before {{item:3022}} was nerfed for being too oppressive. 
Sure it allowed AD champions to live a little longer, but it was almost solely bought for the AD and Sticking potential. 
The added health helped, but unless you were an aggressive champion you wouldn't pick it up regardless.

Just because an item might help you live a little longer, it doesn't instantly make that item built around keeping you alive.
